text: tavada ovun visvasavantayinva hamu vuvahot “apit (obala men) visvasa karannemu” yayida pavasannaha. namut ovun (visvasavantayingen æt vi) tamange (pradhanin vana) seyitanvarun samaga tani vuvahot “niyata vasayenma api obat samagama sitinnemu. (namut) api (visvasavantayin samaga ese pavasa) samaccal karannemu” yayi pavasannaha
